name: toxicity-analyzer
description: Patient-facing toxicity monitoring system for breast cancer treatment

scripts.build:production: npm run build:patient && npm run build:clinician && npm run build:api
scripts.deploy:patient: npm run build:patient && firebase deploy --only hosting:patient-app
scripts.deploy:clinician: npm run build:clinician && firebase deploy --only hosting:clinician-dashboard
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build:patient && npm run build:clinician && firebase deploy --only hosting
